name: Uncle Harvey
description:
What would you do when you are alone? A game project created during my MFA study at NYU Game Center

When I am alone, crazy/funny ideas fly in my mind. This story is one of them. For me, imagination is a kind friend who can blow away the lonely feeling.

This game is developed and polished in 3 weeks, as an assignment for my MFA study. I have never made a visual novel before, hopefully Uncle Harvey won't be a terrible first try.
